pr_title: Generify more of registry-sync-v0 and remove unchecked casts where possible

timeline.message: Cleaned up use of Generics in registry-sync-v0 and used Registry#getKey where possible instead of reverse-lookup of the registry key.

timeline.bodyText: IDE was complaining about get(Object) being deprecated in the FastUtils collection,  hence the explicit cast here.
timeline.author: shartte
